about_me.des: Analyst Developer full stack, freelancer, adventurous in the programming world and always looking for new challenges and knowledge.

projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.searchkit: React UI components / widgets. The easiest way to build a great search experience with Elasticsearch.

career.specialization_des: Completed graduate specialization for Web Applications, University FURG
career.college_des: Completed Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech.), Internet Systems, University Feevale
career.work_des: Development of corporative searches using Google Search Appliance and ElasticSearch. Building sites in Html5 and JavaScript, using php, Java and Python with DBMSs Oracle, Postgres, MySQL and SQLServer for integrations and providing training on the applications developed.
career.tester: Testing Company Soluções em Qualidade de Software
career.tester_des: System testing of accomplishment, creation of test cases, implementation of automated testing, monitoring of test cases and bring new practices and solutions for innovation.
career.support_des: Technical support service with the TEF networks Dedicated and POS systems. Developed activities as TEF installation service Dedicated to Vertical products, ADQ and PINPAD, maintenance TEF Dedicated via LOG analysis, monitoring Link X25 of TEF networks Dedicated, working of reports and monitoring indicators, compliance with account executives Getnet, Banco Santander and knowledge with the solutions TEF Sitef, Director, Itautec, Sixnet, Auttar and Access.
